'''''Skyfrost Nail''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Visitors on the Icy Mountain]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to raise the [[Skyfrost Nail]] in the quest ''[[In the Mountains]]'', then talk to [[Iris (Dragonspine Adventurer Camp)|Iris]].
